name: Soul Master (beta)
description:
soul master is a roguelike pixel art game, this game is currently a beta with no sound 

your name is jacob, you are a soul collector and your job is to explore limbo and gather as many souls as you can, each time you reset your soul counter goes basck to zero

controls:

WASD: move

Mouse cursor: aim

Left click: shoot

Right click: change weapon (normal, bouncy, charged, homing, freezing)

R: reset(use this if you die)

developer contact: mixitgames.business@gmail.com

this game is still a prototype and it is not going to be updated but a demo versio will be updated when its ready
